name: warped-contracts
description: Main collection of scripts and utils for Warped

scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:sol
scripts.verify:WarpedTaxHandler: hardhat verify [address of deployed WarpedTaxHandler contract (find from the log of above deploy script)] --network goerli --constructor-args ./scripts/verify/args/taxHandler.js
scripts.verify:WarpedToken: hardhat verify [address of deployed WarpedToken contract (find from the log of above deploy script)] --network goerli --constructor-args ./scripts/verify/args/token.js
scripts.verify:WarpedTokenManager: hardhat verify [address of deployed WarpedTokenManager contract] --network goerli --constructor-args ./scripts/verify/args/tokenManager.js
scripts.verify:WarpedTreasuryHandler: hardhat verify [address of deployed WarpedTreasuryHandler contract (find from the log of above deploy script)] --network goerli [WarpedTokenManager contract address]

author: Warped Studios
